integration_patterns: Cloud Storage for Health Data Management

evidence.claim: Utilizes Amazon Web Services (AWS) for cloud infrastructure.
Has integrations with EHR systems following HL7 and FHIR standards.
Compliance with HIPAA regulations for data management.
Supports X12 EDI transaction sets for billing and claims processing.

icp.icp_reason: Company uses X12 EDI for healthcare compliance, indicating relevance for API automation in healthcare.
